entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 12:13 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -25.1°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
